abstract: In an interview at his home in Cambridge, Mass., Ezra F. Vogel discussed his book, "Deng Xiaoping and the Transformation of China." Read edited excerpts from an interview with Mr. Vogel.
snippet: In an interview at his home in Cambridge, Mass., Ezra F. Vogel discussed his book, "Deng Xiaoping and the Transformation of China." Read edited excerpts from an interview with Mr. Vogel.

headline.main: Revisiting Deng Xiaoping: A Word With Ezra F. Vogel
